feature.label: XMIECPWorkspace
feature.description:
This features lets you store your projects locally in XMI files. Whether you want to import multiple projects from a folder or your Eclipse workspace, import only one project or create a new project on your disk or workspace - it can cope with your demands.
Please note that this feature is still in an early stage of development.
